---
id: takeRight
---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## takeRight() function

iterable から最後の`l`個の値を取得した Iterable/AsyncIterable を返します。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function takeRight<A>(
  l: number,
  iterable: Iterable<A>,
): IterableIterator<A>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = takeRight(2, [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]);
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 5}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 6}
iter.next(); // {done:true, value: undefined}

// with pipe
pipe([0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6], takeRight(2), toArray); // [5, 6]

await pipe(Promise.resolve([0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]), takeRight(2), toArray); // [5, 6]

// with toAsync
await pipe(
  [
    Promise.resolve(0),
    Promise.resolve(1),
    Promise.resolve(2),
    Promise.resolve(3),
    Promise.resolve(4),
    Promise.resolve(5),
    Promise.resolve(6),
  ],
  toAsync,
  takeRight(2),
  toArray,
); // [5, 6]
```

see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/docs/pipe)<!-- -->, [toAsync](https://fxts.dev/docs/toAsync)<!-- -->, [toArray](https://fxts.dev/docs/toArray)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/takeRight.ts)
